data.what_is:
Your store on autopilot  

Use Marketing Automation from Trustisto, boost your sales and increase your customer retention.

Trustisto is a Marketing Automation platform designed to boost sales in small and large e-commerce using automation and machine learning. The platform operates based on three pillars: customer identification, optimization and retargeting.

Identification means collecting customer data in Customer Data Platform. Trustisto automatically creates customer profiles, carries out profile segmentation tasks and securely stores them in the cloud. The store is the owner of the data. You can run marketing actions on any given group of customers at any time.

Optimization aims at constant increasing of the conversion rate, i.e. boosting store's effectiveness resulting directly in profit. Trustisto implements social proof and fomo, and therefore effectively influences purchase decisions of customers by encouraging them to shop. The process becomes even more effective thanks to the collected data.

Retargeting allows you to win back the customers who have already left your store. Trustisto automatically contacts the customers who have not completed the order, and also invites those who have already made purchases to shop at your store again.
